    protected <T extends BaseMetadata>
    List<T>
    AbstractGroupScanWithMetadata.limitMetadata(Collection<T> metadataList, int maxRecords)
    Prunes specified metadata list and leaves minimum metadata instances count with general rows number which is not less than specified maxRecords.
    protected static <T extends BaseMetadata & LocationProvider>
    Map<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,T>
    AbstractGroupScanWithMetadata.pruneForPartitions(Map<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,T> metadataToPrune, List<PartitionMetadata> filteredPartitionMetadata)
    Removes metadata which does not belong to any of partitions in metadata list.
